rooms.name: Entry Way
rooms.description: The West here has closed up behind you.

rooms.name: Eastern Crossway
rooms.description: The East here is a dead end.

rooms.name: Northern Crossway
rooms.description: The North to here is a dead end.  There’s a statue here of a Sphinx.

rooms.name: Erie Pool
rooms.description: There’s a small pool in the center of this room, a skeletal hand here holds a small green circular gem.

rooms.name: Lonely Tree
rooms.description: There's a large tree here that casts a bright light.

rooms.name: Stained Clearing
rooms.description: There’s a small red stained rock in the middle of this room.

rooms.name: Golem’s Grave
rooms.description: The middle of this room has a broken Dimusvoran golem..

rooms.name: The Forest Crossroads
rooms.description: This room is seemingly benign.

rooms.name: Stained Clearing (2)
rooms.description: There’s a small red stained rock in the middle of this room.

rooms.name: The Rat Nest
rooms.description: A rat nest here guards a small blue triangle gem.

rooms.name: The Bat King
rooms.description: A large bat sits here.  It always faces in the direction of danger.  It will freely give a square yellow gem.

rooms.name: Stained Clearing (3)
rooms.description: There’s a small red stained rock in the middle of this room.

rooms.name: The Hallway
rooms.description: This clearing only has two paths, to the North and South.

rooms.name: The Statue of Ahvhar
rooms.description: There’s a statue in the center of the room here that depicts the Old God of the Sky.

rooms.name: Stained Clearing (4)
rooms.description: There’s a small red stained rock in the middle of this room.

rooms.name: The Sunless Sundial
rooms.description: There’s a sundial in the middle of this room.

rooms.name: The Snake
rooms.description: A statue of a snake holds a red rectangular gem.

rooms.name: Stained Clearing (5)
rooms.description: There’s a small red stained rock in the middle of this room.

rooms.name: The Ringed River
rooms.description: There’s circular river here.  It flows couter-clockwise

rooms.name: The Exit of Envy
rooms.description: There’s a large door to the South here that leaves the maze.
